title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Looking for an ML Engineer skilled in Python, TensorFlow, and cloud deployment. Experience in NLP and data pipelines is a plus.

title: Backend Developer
description: We need a backend engineer with experience in Java, Spring Boot, Docker, and AWS. Knowledge of microservices is preferred.

title: Data Analyst
description: Seeking a Data Analyst proficient in SQL, Excel, Power BI, and Python. Strong analytical skills required.

title: AI Research Intern
description: Internship for students with knowledge of deep learning, PyTorch, and research in NLP or Computer Vision.
